verses.verse: And the Canaanite<WH3669>, the king<WH4428> of Arad<WH6166>, who dwelt<WH3427> in the South<WH5045>, heard<WH8085> tell that Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> by the way<WH1870> of Atharim<WH871>; and he fought<WH3898> against Israel<WH3478>, and took<WH7617> some of them captive<WH7628>.

And Israel<WH3478> vowed<WH5087> a vow<WH5088> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, and said<WH559>, If thou wilt indeed<WH5414> deliver<WH5414> this people<WH5971> into my hand<WH3027>, then I will utterly destroy<WH2763> their cities<WH5892>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> hearkened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Israel<WH3478>, and delivered up<WH5414> the Canaanites<WH3669>; and they utterly destroyed<WH2763> them and their cities<WH5892>: and the name<WH8034> of the place<WH4725> was called<WH7121> Hormah<WH2767>.

And they journeyed<WH5265> from mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023> by the way<WH1870> to the Red<WH5488> Sea<WH3220>, to compass<WH5437> the land<WH776> of Edom<WH123>: and the soul<WH5315> of the people<WH5971> was much discouraged<WH7114> because of the way<WH1870>.

And the people<WH5971> spake<WH1696> against God<WH430>, and against Moses<WH4872>, Wherefore have ye brought us up<WH5927> out of Egypt<WH4714> to die<WH4191> in the wilderness<WH4057>? for there is no bread<WH3899>, and there is no water<WH4325>; and our soul<WH5315> loatheth<WH6973> this light<WH7052> bread<WH3899>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> sent<WH7971> fiery<WH8314> serpents<WH5175> among the people<WH5971>, and they bit<WH5391> the people<WH5971>; and much<WH7227> people<WH5971> of Israel<WH3478> died<WH4191>.

And the people<WH5971> came<WH935> to Moses<WH4872>, and said<WH559>, We have sinned<WH2398>, because we have spoken<WH1696> against Jehovah<WH3068>, and against thee<WH6419>; pray unto Jehovah<WH3068>, that he take away<WH5493> the serpents<WH5175> from us<WH4872>. And Moses prayed<WH6419> for the people<WH5971>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Make<WH6213> thee a fiery serpent<WH8314>, and set<WH7760> it upon a standard<WH5251>: and it shall come to pass<WH5391>, that every one that is bitten, when he seeth<WH7200> it<WH2425>, shall live.

And Moses<WH4872> made<WH6213> a serpent<WH5175> of brass<WH5178>, and set<WH7760> it upon the standard<WH5251>: and it came to pass<WH5175>, that if a serpent had bitten<WH5391> any man<WH376>, when he looked<WH5027> unto the serpent<WH5175> of brass<WH5178>, he lived<WH2425>.
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed<WH5265>, and encamped<WH2583> in Oboth<WH88>.
And they journeyed<WH5265> from Oboth<WH88>, and encamped<WH2583> at Iyeabarim<WH5863>, in the wilderness<WH4057> which is before<WH6440> Moab<WH4124>, toward the sunrising<WH4217>.
From thence they journeyed<WH5265>, and encamped<WH2583> in the valley<WH5158> of Zered<WH2218>.

From thence they journeyed<WH5265>, and encamped<WH2583> on the other side<WH5676> of the Arnon<WH769>, which is in the wilderness<WH4057>, that cometh out<WH3318> of the border<WH1366> of the Amorites<WH567>: for the Arnon<WH769> is the border<WH1366> of Moab<WH4124>, between Moab<WH4124> and the Amorites<WH567>.
Wherefore it is said<WH559> in the book<WH5612> of the Wars<WH4421> of Jehovah<WH3068>, Vaheb<WH2052> in Suphah<WH5492>, And the valleys<WH5158> of the Arnon<WH769>,
And the slope<WH793> of the valleys<WH5158> That inclineth<WH5186> toward the dwelling<WH3427> of Ar<WH6144>, And leaneth<WH8172> upon the border<WH1366> of Moab<WH4124>.

And from thence they journeyed to Beer<WH876>: that is the well<WH875> whereof Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Gather<WH622> the people<WH5971> together<WH622>, and I will give<WH5414> them water<WH4325>.
Then sang<WH7891> Israel<WH3478> this song<WH7892>: Spring up<WH5927>, O well<WH875>; sing ye unto it<WH6030>:

The well<WH875>, which the princes<WH8269> digged<WH2658>, Which the nobles<WH5081> of the people<WH5971> delved<WH3738>, With the sceptre<WH2710>, and with their staves<WH4938>. And from the wilderness<WH4057> they journeyed to Mattanah<WH4980>;
and from Mattanah<WH4980> to Nahaliel<WH5160>; and from Nahaliel<WH5160> to Bamoth<WH1120>;
and from Bamoth<WH1120> to the valley<WH1516> that is in the field<WH7704> of Moab<WH4124>, to the top<WH7218> of Pisgah<WH6449>, which looketh<WH8259> down<WH6440> upon the desert<WH3452>.
And Israel<WH3478> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> unto Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, saying<WH559>,

Let me pass<WH5674> through thy land<WH776>: we will not turn<WH5186> aside into field<WH7704>, or into vineyard<WH3754>; we will not drink<WH8354> of the water<WH4325> of the wells<WH875>: we will go<WH3212> by the king<WH4428>'s highway<WH1870>, until we have passed<WH5674> thy border<WH1366>.

And Sihon<WH5511> would not suffer<WH5414> Israel<WH3478> to pass<WH5674> through his border<WH1366>: but Sihon<WH5511> gathered<WH622> all his people<WH5971> together<WH622>, and went out<WH3318> against<WH7125> Israel<WH3478> into the wilderness<WH4057>, and came<WH935> to Jahaz<WH3096>; and he fought<WH3898> against Israel<WH3478>.

And Israel<WH3478> smote<WH5221> him with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and possessed<WH3423> his land<WH776> from the Arnon<WH769> unto the Jabbok<WH2999>, even unto the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>; for the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> was strong<WH5794>.
And Israel<WH3478> took<WH3947> all these cities<WH5892>: and Israel<WH3478> dwelt<WH3427> in all the cities<WH5892> of the Amorites<WH567>, in Heshbon<WH2809>, and in all the towns thereof<WH1323>.

For Heshbon<WH2809> was the city<WH5892> of Sihon<WH5511> the king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, who had fought<WH3898> against the former<WH7223> king<WH4428> of Moab<WH4124>, and taken<WH3947> all his land<WH776> out of his hand<WH3027>, even unto the Arnon<WH769>.
Wherefore they that speak in proverbs<WH4911> say<WH559>, Come<WH935> ye to Heshbon<WH2809>; Let the city<WH5892> of Sihon<WH5511> be built<WH1129> and established<WH3559>:

For a fire<WH784> is gone out<WH3318> of Heshbon<WH2809>, A flame<WH3852> from the city<WH7151> of Sihon<WH5511>: It hath devoured<WH398> Ar<WH6144> of Moab<WH4124>, The lords of the high places<WH1181> of the Arnon<WH769>.

Woe <WH188> to thee<WH4124>, Moab! Thou art undone<WH6>, O people<WH5971> of Chemosh<WH3645>: He hath given<WH5414> his sons<WH1121> as fugitives<WH6412>, And his daughters<WH1323> into captivity<WH7622>, Unto Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>.
We have shot<WH3384> at them<WH2809>; Heshbon is perished<WH6> even unto Dibon<WH1769>, And we have laid waste<WH8074> even unto Nophah<WH5302>, Which reacheth unto Medeba<WH4311>.
Thus Israel<WH3478> dwelt<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of the Amorites<WH567>.
And Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> to spy out<WH7270> Jazer<WH3270>; and they took<WH3920> the towns<WH1323> thereof<WH3423>, and drove out the Amorites that were there<WH567>.

And they turned<WH6437> and went up<WH5927> by the way<WH1870> of Bashan<WH1316>: and Og<WH5747> the king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316> went out<WH3318> against<WH7125> them<WH5971>, he and all his people, to battle<WH4421> at Edrei<WH154>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Fear<WH3372> him not<WH5414>: for I have delivered him into thy hand<WH3027>, and all his people<WH5971>, and his land<WH776>; and thou shalt do<WH6213> to him as thou didst<WH6213> unto Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, who dwelt<WH3427> at Heshbon<WH2809>.
So they smote<WH5221> him<WH1121>, and his sons and all his people<WH5971>, until there was none<WH1115> left<WH7604> him remaining<WH8300>: and they possessed<WH3423> his land<WH776>.
